snippet: A research center funded by the Affordable Care Act is being criticized for not using proven methods like clinical trials to learn how to best deliver care.
abstract: Innovation Center, research facility funded by Affordable Care Act, is being criticized by many researchers and economists for not using proven methods like randomized clinical trials to learn how to best deliver health care; experts say center, which undertakes mostly demonstration projects, is squandering crucial opportunity to develop evidence needed to retool nation's troubled health care system.
lead_paragraph: A research center funded by the Affordable Care Act is being criticized for not using proven methods like clinical trials to learn how to best deliver care.

headline.main: Method of Study Is Criticized in Group’s Health Policy Tests
headline.print_headline: Method of Study Is Criticized in Group’s Health Policy Tests
